name.str: Battle Steel ceramic side plate, NIJ III+
name.str_pl: Battle Steel ceramic side plates, NIJ III+

description: A full-cut ballistic plate with slightly clipped corners and a single-curve profile, composed of a silicon carbide strike face and a UHMWPE backer, wrapped in ballistic nylon.  Manufacturer's logo is proudly displayed on the outward-facing side.  This plate is rated for NIJ III+, which means it's been tested to survive at least 3 rounds of high-energy rifle rounds, and then some.  Plates like this one are intended to be inserted into a plate carrier where it will absorb the energy of multiple rifle rounds before requiring replacement.  This model is a 6″×6″ side panel and can only fit in side panel pouches on a plate carrier.
damage_verb: makes a crunch, something has shifted

name.str: compromised Battle Steel ceramic side plate

description: This ceramic plate has been taken out of service by the damage it had suffered.  It will no longer provide significant protection against bullets, and should be replaced or thrown away.
